From: ONS Surveys <surveys@ons.gov.uk>

Subject: Activate your ONS Surveys account



Thank you for registering for an ONS Surveys account.

Please Activate your account to confirm your email address.

For help please call 0300 1234931 or from outside the UK +44 1633 810495.

This service is a alpha version, which means it is a trial service. Find out more.
